item.description:
We will hold signs and distribute literature outside the offices of Jane Doe at 15 Beacon st. Boston , opposite the State House during lunch hour, 12 noon to 1-1:30. If you or someone you know has been subject to the 209A RO please come and show your support in opposition to Jane Doe's promotion of these laws.

More info, call 857 350-0575

********************************************
We will have a conference call TONIGHT, Tuesday,
October 7, 9:01 pm, to discuss the Thursday lunchtime
event outside Jane Doe's office at 15 Beacon St., Boston.

The dial in number is 1 309 946-5255 and the
access # is 982712

If you plan to attend Thursday or have some ideas you
are invited to join the call.
**********************************************
item.how_to_find_us: Look for signs outside 15 Beacon st.
item.name: Sign holding/literature distribution outside Jane Doe's Office
